name: Collective Memories: An Idle Walking Simulator
name_original: Collective Memories: An Idle Walking Simulator
description:
LD41 Jam entry: A mashup of a (several) walking simulators, and an idle game

After the Jam we plan to finish our vision by:
- Adding Story Modifier upgrades you can buy in for Story Points
- Adding "Easter Eggs" you can collect and use to buy silly Easter Egg updgrades
- Rebalance point gain/upgrade costs
- Other general polish
